author: Jenna Tolls
comment: It's alright. However, for $9 I can buy the actual remote for my Blu Ray Player. What's the point of paying twice to use an IR blaster in my phone? It works as well as the free apps.

author: LUNA Tangoh
comment: I lost my remote and this app is helping me

author: Chris Harris
comment: Says there is a trail forces you to pay 8.99 to use

author: Abdula Asanovski
comment: RUBBISH

author: Steve Brown
comment: Apparently my blu ray/av can't be made by Panasonic...

author: Jason Laskowski
comment: This app actually works with IR.   So many assume we have WiFi control.
title: Panasonic/TWC

author: Michael Yoni
comment: Serves its purpose when wife is a sleep on couch and sitting on the remote.
title: Serves its purpose

author: Adji seck
comment: It works brilliantly, but the only thing is I cannot find the volume button

author: Matt Adams
comment: Dont bother
title: Rubbish

author: Whom Isac
comment: I thought it worked using both WiFi or IR blaster. When I opened the app there is no option for IR detection.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: It does IR and WI-Fi. Your device doesn't have a compatible IR blaster, you can use a 3rd party blaster from Broadlink/Orvibo/Keene or GlobalCache

title: Wrong advertising of the app

author: Josh Smith
comment: Thanks great app
title: Worked straight away

author: Iane Bandiwan
comment: Make it free

author: James Schumacher
comment: Sucks

author: Mich Law
comment: Fab, worked as soon as installed very impressed, can't find volume controls though everything else fab

author: Gavin Ray
comment: I lost my Panasonic remote and can't afford wifi. It was stuck at the Lifestyle screen and I had no way to change the device input to fullscreen from its windowed state because the TV has no button for it.. I manually added the TV and it worked! Thank you so much.
title: Saved me money

author: Tanya Colpo
comment: This is the best app ever after losing my origonal remote i tried everyone of these  app remotes and not one worked then i came accross this one it is literally like having my old remote back it does everything the original one done 10 stars guys great work

author: Ernest Botah
comment: Disappointing app does not work on my honor 6 plus which is an Android phone. Not good

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: We have fixed the bug with the honor 6. Please uninstall our trial and reinstall it again to try again.

title: Does not work on da honor 6 +

author: Karen Neko
comment: Trial ew. Not free. Lies
So far, so good. Most of the remote control apps do not work; this one worked for me. I'll updated my experience after I use it for a while.
title: It worked!

author: Gary Barnes
comment: Simply worked. 1st attempt. Was in a motel room with a Panasonic tv and no factory remote needed to change inputs. Downloaded this, choose Panasonic and it worked perfectly.
title: GWB

author: Brenda Grice
comment: It works from my Samsung Nook tablet with a hotel Panasonic with infared. It, however, will not work from my LG G3, same tv. It will not give me the option to scan for infared device. It will not give me the actual "remote" screen either.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: LG G3 should now work with Lollipop

title: It kind of works...

author: Justin WIllis
comment: Only IR blaster that works for my panasonic TV. Hurray!
title: It actually works!

author: Nathon Roden
comment: Works great until the trial runs out. But then again you get what you pay for

author: Mansur Khawaja
comment: Works pretty well.

author: philip rippy
comment: I couldn't find any remote that worked with my blu ray until I found this
title: Great remote

author: Kristina Martin
comment: Searched lot's of remotes on Google Play for a good remote.  Finally found this one.  It actually turns TV on and off and works just like the remote that came with my Panasonic TV.  If you are using the Panasonic Remote 2 app, do yourself a favor and get this app - it works so much better.
title: Great App!  Works with Panasonic Viera

author: Michelle Fulmer
comment: Oh heck yeah. No problem.

author: George Nassif
comment: Thanks.  The official Panasonic app doesn't support my model, or the 210...but this one does.
title: DMP-BDT215 works!

author: Keri
comment: No volume button.

author: Ernesto Sharp
comment: Avoid isvfreezijg all my tab

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: It's been tested on the Galaxy Note 10.1. What model of Panasonic TV or BD do you have? Please email us for support.

title: Avoid

author: Ion Rane
comment: Installed, and it automatically worked for my Sony device (connects Netflix, Amazon, Google, Pandora,etc.. to my TV), and the volume button to my Panasonic TV also works. (The Remote for Sony device isn't programmed to control the volume to TV, so we must use 2 remotes.) Cycling, while watching Netflix: it'll be easier to use this than trying to juggle phone and 2 remotes.  That said, design of user interface is messy, ugly, and crowed (even on note 2), so time will tell how often I use it at the couch.
title: Ugly..but works!

author: Anacar TiTiDaBe
comment: I purchased this app, had to uninstall it because of black screens and now it won't let me use the app after reinstalling it.

author: David Adams
comment: It works great it's amazing if u ask it to me I would say get it because this app is the best ever I think so I would always say yes to this app
title: Love it

author: Dominika Lee
comment: I have an old school Panasonic tv and it wouldn't work on it. I was disappointed.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: How would it work? IR? It does this if your phone supports it, your phone doesn't support IR so it has to connect using your network which your old TV doesn't have. We'll work on a version that uses magic, but until we can defy the law's of physics it will stay just WiFi and IR.

title: Didn't work

author: BIG LOKOTE
comment: Works only my Roku.. NOT my television
title: No good

author: James Simpson
comment: Don't waste your time
title: Junk

author: Thinking Mom
comment: Great app! All functions work except for the volume, any suggestions? Thank you!
title: Only operable app!

comment: Did not work for me
